verses.verse: וּבִשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> year אַחַ֗ת <S%H259><s%> Now in the first לְכ֙וֹרֶשׁ֙ <S%H3566><s%> of Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king פָּרַ֔ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia לִכְל֥וֹת <S%H3615><s%> might be fulfilled דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> that the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִפִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> by the mouth יִרְמְיָ֑ה <S%H3414><s%> of Jeremiah הֵעִ֣יר <S%H5782><s%> stirred up יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit כֹּ֣רֶשׁ <S%H3566><s%> of Cyrus מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king פָּרַ֔ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia וַיַּֽעֲבֶר־ <S%H5674><s%> sent קוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> A proclamation בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <S%H4438><s%> throughout all his kingdom וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also בְּמִכְתָּ֖ב <S%H4385><s%> and [put it] also in writing לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith כֹּ֚רֶשׁ <S%H3566><s%> Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king פָּרַ֔ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> me all the kingdoms הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth נָ֣תַן <S%H5414><s%> hath given לִ֔י יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> and He פָקַ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> and he hath charged עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> and לִבְנֽוֹת־ <S%H1129><s%> me to build ל֣וֹ בַ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> him an house בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּֽיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> which [is] in Judah

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Whoever בָכֶ֣ם מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עַמּ֗וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become אֱלֹהָיו֙ <S%H430><s%> God עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with וְיַ֕עַל <S%H5927><s%> be with him and let him go up לִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> which [is] in Judah וְיִ֗בֶן <S%H1129><s%> and build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> is the God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every הַנִּשְׁאָ֗ר <S%H7604><s%> And whosoever remaineth מִֽכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every הַמְּקֹמוֹת֮ <S%H4725><s%> in any place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he גָֽר־ <S%H1481><s%> where he sojourneth שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> in it יְנַשְּׂא֙וּהוּ֙ <S%H5375><s%> help אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> the men מְקֹמ֔וֹ <S%H4725><s%> of his place בְּכֶ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> him with silver וּבְזָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> and with gold וּבִרְכ֣וּשׁ <S%H7399><s%> and with goods וּבִבְהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and with beasts עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> together הַ֨נְּדָבָ֔ה <S%H5071><s%> beside the freewill offering לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> for the house הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> that [is] in Jerusalem

וַיָּק֜וּמוּ <S%H6965><s%> Then rose up רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> the chief הָאָב֗וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites לְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> everyone הֵעִ֤יר <S%H5782><s%> had raised הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רוּח֔וֹ <S%H7307><s%> with all [them] whose spirit לַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to go up לִבְנ֔וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> which [is] in Jerusalem

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All סְבִיבֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5439><s%> And all they that [were] about חִזְּק֣וּ <S%H2388><s%> them strengthened בִֽידֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands בִּכְלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> with vessels כֶ֧סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver בַּזָּהָ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> with gold בָּרְכ֥וּשׁ <S%H7399><s%> with goods וּבַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> and with beasts וּבַמִּגְדָּנ֑וֹת <S%H4030><s%> and with precious things לְבַ֖ד <S%H905><s%> aside עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> from כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הִתְנַדֵּֽב׃ <S%H5068><s%> beside all [that] was willingly offered ס

וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king כּ֔וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3566><s%> Also Cyrus הוֹצִ֖יא <S%H3318><s%> brought forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> the vessels בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הוֹצִ֤יא <S%H3318><s%> had brought forth נְבֽוּכַדְנֶצַּר֙ <S%H5019><s%> which Nebuchadnezzar מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> out of Jerusalem וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> and had put בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> them in the house אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> of his gods

וַיּֽוֹצִיאֵ֗ם <S%H3318><s%> bring forth כּ֚וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3566><s%> Even those did Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king פָּרַ֔ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> out יַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מִתְרְדָ֣ת <S%H4990><s%> of Mithredath הַגִּזְבָּ֑ר <S%H1489><s%> the treasurer וַֽיִּסְפְּרֵם֙ <S%H5608><s%> and numbered לְשֵׁשְׁבַּצַּ֔ר <S%H8339><s%> them unto Sheshbazzar הַנָּשִׂ֖יא <S%H5387><s%> the prince לִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another מִסְפָּרָ֑ם <S%H4557><s%> And this [is] the number אֲגַרְטְלֵ֨י <S%H105><s%> chargers זָהָ֜ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold שְׁלֹשִׁ֗ים <S%H7970><s%> of them thirty אֲגַרְטְלֵי־ <S%H105><s%> chargers כֶ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> of silver אָ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand מַחֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H4252><s%> knives תִּשְׁעָ֥ה <S%H8672><s%> nine וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty ס

כְּפוֹרֵ֤י <S%H3713><s%> basons זָהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> of gold שְׁלֹשִׁ֔ים <S%H7970><s%> Thirty כְּפ֤וֹרֵי <S%H3713><s%> basons כֶ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> silver מִשְׁנִ֔ים <S%H4932><s%> of a second אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> [sort] four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וַעֲשָׂרָ֑ה <S%H6235><s%> and ten כֵּלִ֥ים <S%H3627><s%> vessels אֲחֵרִ֖ים <S%H312><s%> [and] other אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> a thousand ס

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כֵּלִים֙ <S%H3627><s%> All the vessels לַזָּהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְלַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and of silver חֲמֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> [were] five אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וְאַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> and four מֵא֑וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred הַכֹּ֞ל <S%H3605><s%> all הֶעֱלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> bring up שֵׁשְׁבַּצַּ֗ר <S%H8339><s%> All [these] did Sheshbazzar עִ֚ם <S%H5973><s%> who הֵעָל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> that were brought up הַגּוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1473><s%> with [them of] the captivity מִבָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> from Babylon לִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> unto Jerusalem פ
